sense.def:
Kdor je
simple-minded
, si stvari razlaga na poenostavljen način, ker ne razume, kako zapletene so.

seg.quote: ...the simple-minded view that people have of robots.

sense.def:
Izraz
simple-minded
uporabljamo tudi za osebo počasnega ali zmedenega uma.

seg.quote: She became frail, simple-minded, and returned to her youth.
